00040 void test()
00041 {
00042     Peptide angiotensin("DRVYIHPF");
00043     if (os_) *os_ << "angiotensin: " << angiotensin.sequence() << " " << angiotensin.formula() << endl;
00044 
00045     Peptide alpha16("WHWLQL");
00046     if (os_) *os_ << "alpha16: " << alpha16.sequence() << " " << alpha16.formula() << endl;
00047 }

00050 const char* sequences[] = 
00051 {
00052     "CLPMILDNK",
00053     "AVSNPFQQR",
00054     "CELLFFFK",
00055     "AGASIVGVNCR",
00056     "QPTPPFFGR",
00057     "AVFHMQSVK"

00060 
00061 void isotopeTest()
00062 {
00063     cout << "\n\npeptide isotope test\n";
00064     using namespace Chemistry;
00065     IsotopeCalculator calc(.0001, .2);
00066 
00067     cout.precision(10);
00068 
00069     for (int i=0; i<6; i++)
00070     {
00071         Peptide peptide(sequences[i]);
00072         MassDistribution md = calc.distribution(peptide.formula());
00073         cout << peptide.formula() << " (" << peptide.formula().monoisotopicMass() << "):\n" << md;
00074 
00075         for (int j=0; j<4; j++)
00076             cout << md[j].abundance/md[0].abundance << " ";
00077         cout << "\n\n";
00078     }
00079 }

00082 const char* mrfaSequences[] =
00083 {
00084     "MRFA",
00085     "MRF",
00086     "MR",
00087     "M",
00088     "RFA",
00089     "FA",
00090     "A"
00091 };
00092 
00093 
00094 const int mrfaSequencesSize = sizeof(mrfaSequences)/sizeof(const char*);
00095 
00096 
00097 void printSequenceInfo(const char* sequence)
00098 {
00099     using Chemistry::Formula;
00100 
00101     Peptide peptide(sequence);
00102     Formula water("H2O1");
00103     Formula residueSum = peptide.formula() - water; 
00104     Formula bIon = residueSum + Formula("H1");
00105     Formula yIon = residueSum + Formula("H3O1");
00106 
00107     if (os_) *os_ 
00108          << fixed << setprecision(2) 
00109          << setw(6) << peptide.sequence() << " " 
00110          << setw(8) << peptide.formula().monoisotopicMass() << " " 
00111          << setw(8) << residueSum.monoisotopicMass() << " "
00112          << setw(8) << bIon.monoisotopicMass() << " "
00113          << setw(8) << yIon.monoisotopicMass() << " "
00114          << endl; 
00115 }
00116 
00117 
00118 void fragmentTest()
00119 {
00120     for_each(mrfaSequences, mrfaSequences + mrfaSequencesSize, printSequenceInfo);
00121 }
00122 
00123 
00124 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00125 {
00126     try
00127     {
00128         if (argc>1 && !strcmp(argv[1],"-v")) os_ = &cout;
00129         if (os_) *os_ << "PeptideTest\n";
00130         //test();
00131         //isotopeTest();
00132         fragmentTest();
00133         return 0;
00134     }
00135     catch (exception& e)
00136     {
00137         cerr << e.what() << endl;
00138         return 1;
00139     }
00140 }
